name: 陌生人
description:
This is an original novel developed by an individual, which adopts first person vision to tell a story about love and exploring real love.
Unlike the traditional GALGAME, the characters in this work are fresh, and their story is completely independent of the player's will.
We can act as a spectator and browse the psychological process of the protagonist,
But beyond that, we can't do anything, even the developers themselves.
